title: Ticket #1104: master and collector block on startup
description: The master sleeps for 3 seconds after starting the collector. There doesn't seem to be any point, and, anyway, the collector spends most of this time blocked waiting for the master to respond to the security negotiation of the initial "child alive" command.
check_ins:
2010-Jan-12 19:12   Check-in [25198]: Documented removal of 3-second pause after starting collector. #1104 (By Dan Bradley )
2010-Jan-08 15:17   Check-in [16857]: Got rid of 3-second pause after starting collector. The collector was typically blocked trying to negotiate a security session with the sleeping master during most of the 3 seconds. Now the master asynchronously waits for the collector to create its address file, if COLLECTOR_ADDRESS_FILE is configured. [...] (By Dan Bradley )
